entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `System.Text.Json`. Add ability to convert a JSON array to `[Flags]` enum #70864
  • Strange runtime failure - unmanaged heap corruption #70860
  • [API Proposal]: Update to the `LibraryImport` custom marshalling shape #70859
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Random `Uncaught Error: Assert failed: subtle crypto not initialized` in `WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Security.Cryptography.Tests` #70858
  • [wasm] Random uncaught js exceptions in `System.Security.Cryptography.Tests` on the browser #70856
  • emitter::emitDispIns() does not print LARGEJMP instruction code on ARM64 #70849
    Future
  • Statically Linked NativeAOT HelloWorld throws Segmentation fault with Globalization Cultural Data #70848
    Future
  • [wasm] `Csc` task failing with `Unexpected exception:` - ` (ReleaseMutex failed. WaitOne Id: 13 Release Id: 13)` #70836
  • `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzer` should support top-level statements #70835
    7.0.0
  • ExecutionEngineException is thrown in .net7 WPF app when i EnC #70834
  • Weird issue with stale File.GetCreationTimeUtc (Windows only) #70830
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Object> #70839
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods #70842
  • [Android] JIT/opt/OSR/pinnedlocal/pinnedlocal.sh #70820
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][firefox] Add exception handling in evaluateJSAsync #70819
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Byte> #70844
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Byte> #70845
  • X509Chain do not build chain online with a download certificate by HTTPS schema on Linux #70816
  • NativeAOT compiler crashes if assembly missing #70815
  • TimeZoneInfo.GetUtcOffset returns different value on Windows and Linux #70813
  • Add support for ILLink.Descriptors.xml #70810
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fetching assemblies in the debug proxy is (possibly) slower now #70807
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse2\\Sse2_ro\\Sse2_ro.cmd #70804
  • [libraries-pgo]: Assertion failed 'fgDominate(head, entry)' in 'System.Text.Encoding:GetByteCount(System.String,int,int):int:this' during 'Hoist loop code' (IL size 109; hash 0x10278d31; Tier1) #70802
    7.0.0

Closed

  • CSharpCodeGenerator---FromFileBatch Implementation request #70817
  • StreamContent.ReadOnlyStream fails Stream conformance tests #70725
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: all ilasm/ildasm round-trip tests failing #68455
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten 2.0.21 introduces failures where UnauthorizedAccessException is not thrown #53021
    7.0.0
  • C# Dictionary insertion speed could be improved (performance) #70796
  • Regressions from vector constants change #70368
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in multiple benchmarks after `char.Is*` update #69727
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/28/2022 1:41:21 AM #70162
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/21/2022 4:54:11 AM #69725
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #70161
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failure while crossgenning ImageSharp: '!op1->TypeIs(TYP_STRUCT) && (op1->TypeGet() == op2->TypeGet())' in 'SixLabors.ImageSharp.PixelFormats.Byte4:ToString():System.String:this' during 'Morph - Global' #70824
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in IndexOf #70158
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringSegmentBenchmark #70503
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Tests.Perf_Encoding and Perf_Encoders #70501
    7.0.0
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure support in reflection free Native AOT #70837
  • [Perf] Changes at 6/2/2022 10:27:31 PM #70499
    7.0.0
  • [Jit x86] Checked Constraint Doesn't Participate in Dead Code Elimination #9228
    Future
  • [QUIC] Call `LocalCertificateSelectionCallback` before handshake #70651
    7.0.0
  • ActivitySource.CreateActivity returns null even when supplied with listeners #70840
  • Ad-hoc codesign on macOS #65228
  • Use live apphost build in crossgen2 #66866
  • [API Proposal]: Fix to ActivityListener.ShouldListenTo edge case #70727
    Future
  • "No output has been received" when debugging Blazor Wasm in the browser - can't debug #70841
  • Iconize executable #69372
    Future
  • Azure DevOps is down - all CI jobs failing #69374
  • Difference in code quality: inline vs. local vector #64879
    7.0.0
  • Blazor RegionInfo delivers wrong NativeName #53880
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Check if `python` is installed when installing the workload #54638
    7.0.0
  • Debugger - Blazor WASM: Uncaught pause_on_uncaught (anonymous) @ VM324:1 #62146
    7.0.0
  • DAC heapwalker doesn't detect memory corruption that makes objects appear to have zero size #70750
    7.0.0
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure intrinsic should make sure the ctor is reflectable #70072
    7.0.0
  • PAX Tar timestamps from extended attributes parsing may not be a `double`, but `long.long` #70801
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for timer scheduling happening on the incorrect thread when wasm threading is enabled #70863
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, WASM, 7.0.0
  • Use `Array.Empty()` in `System.Reflection.Metadata`. #70862
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Support `PUTARG_SPLIT(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use hash/hmac one shots in NTLM #70857
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Delete StaticallyLinked property from Microsoft.NETCore.Native.Unix.props #70854
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix bug in Tar preventing extraction of hardlinks or entries starting with `.\` #70853
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Assign proper VNs to "shared constant" CSE defs #70852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Extend MonoAOTCompiler Task #70851
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove allocation in ImmutableArray Builder Sort #70850
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Small performance cleanup in S.S.Cryptography #70847
    area-System.Security
  • WIP: Do not generate impossible instantiations for constrained generics in Mono AOT #70838
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix GC stress failure in LoaderAllocator::CompareExchangeValueInHandle #70832
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable lib tests that used to fail with GC issues #70831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Migrate to ref/out param while reading data from typed array #70823
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Simplify instructions for using ILC #70811
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: break loop canonicalization into two stages #70809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for randomized guard stack cookies #70806
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [coop] fix coop suspend timeout cue card #70828
    area-Threading-mono
  • Catch (more) mismatched args in `fgMorphArgs` #70846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a few Stream-related issues in System.Net.Http #70731
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix corerun for assemblies with mismatched filename #70800
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places #70176
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Enabled WriteToReadOnly tests - emscripten bug got fixed #70814
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO
  • [Mono] Disable long running test on Android #70843
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable IDE1005 (Delegate invocation can be simplified) #70522
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Disable WBT test failing on windows #70808
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Tighten checks in `areArgumentsContiguous` #70829
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Narrow cast fix #70518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add limited support for LocalCertificateSelectionCallback for QUIC #70716
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Delete redundant aliases for primitive types #70805
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Simplify `Environment.IsWindows8OrAbove`. #70818
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add two new stages to prepare for our new custom type marshalling design. #70598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add icon to dotnet.exe on Windows #70578
    area-Host
  • Use LastIndexOf in ZipArchiveEntry.GetFileName_Unix #70701
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Update dogfooding instructions #70833
    area-Meta
  • JIT: relax fwd sub restriction on changing class handle #70587
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix jump removal regression blocking jit_stress_splitting in runtime-jit-experimental #70797
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix emitDispJumpList for Arm64 #70542
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable ThreadAbort with CET enabled via the QueueUserAPC2 #70803
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add end-to-end test for NTLM/Negotiate authentication against fake server #70630
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove workaround to get pauseOnExceptions setting #70748
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid infinite loop in case of heap corruption #70759
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: rework optCanonicalizeLoop #70792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add support for cross module inlining and cross module generic compilation to Crossgen2 #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Don't use addressing modes for volatile loads for gc types #70794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimize `i % 2` #70599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix building with clang 14 #69990
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Use `gtEffectiveVal` for `GT_ADD` op1 in `optCreateAssertion` #70228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on Windows x64 #70777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0020 (Use pattern matching) #70523
    area-Meta
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • fix: [Wasm] Add missing libicudata.a for native layout #70682
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • EventLogException is missing the original win32 error code #70629
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • VM: Better strategy for TryReserveInitialMemory on arm64 (jump stubs) #70707
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0054 (Use compound assignment) #70564
    area-Meta
  • Add AddSystemd() and AddWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono] Fix SpanHelpers.Reverse regression #70650
    area-System.Memory
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the LHS of block copies #70782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use new byte[] span optimization in a few more places #70665
    area-Meta
  • Minor refactoring for `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzer` #70767
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update the version of dotnet used for Maui stuff from 6.0.3 to 6.0.4. #70788
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70795
    area-System.Numerics
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement Vector128 version of System.Buffers.Text.Base64 DecodeFromUtf8 and EncodeToUtf8 #70654
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Remove some dead code / branches #70146
    area-Meta
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve TLS1.3 detection in registry for QUIC #70730
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Use crypto.subtle for HMAC on Browser WASM #70745
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Unpin locals, attempt 2 #70655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-ppc64le
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement NegotiateAuthentication API #70720
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Allow child process reaping by other thread(library) #70705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Convert fallback path of GetCommandLineArgs to managed #70608
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix race condition between GCInfo and Rundown #70609
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
